Package item

Class Item

java.lang.Object
item.Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
CartItem
public class Item extends Object
Represents a menu item with attriutes like item ID, name, price, category, and description.
Author:
FDAA Grp 5

    Item(String itemId, String name, double price, String category, String description)

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(String itemId, String name, double price, Category category, String description)
      Constructs a new Item with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the unique id for the menu item
      name - the name of the menu item
      price - the price of the menu item
      category - the category of the menu item, as defined in the Category enum
      description - a brief description of the menu item

    • Item

      public Item(String itemId, String name, double price, String category, String description)
      Alternative constructor that accepts a category name as a string and converts it to a Category enum.
      Parameters:
      itemId - the unique identifier for the item
      name - the name of the item
      price - the price of the item
      category - the name of the category, which is converted to a Category enum
      description - a brief description of the item
